testcase.name: open with dir fails if there is no repo in that dir
open with dir succeeds if repo is in that directory
open without dir fails if there is no repo in the current dir
open without dir succeeds if current directory is repo dir
open without dir succeeds if current directory is subdir of a repo
open without dir succeeds if .git in current dir has gitdir
open without dir succeeds if .git in parent dir has gitdir
open with currentDir succeeds if current directory is subdir of a repo
opened repo can be deleted after being closed
